sentences.en: All dimensions MUST be in accordance with specification. No undersize thickness allowed, better to err over.
sentences.cn: 所有尺寸必须按照规格. 厚度不允许低于规格, 最好不要有误差.

sentences.en: Bolts with drilled or undersize heads shall not be used.
sentences.cn: 被钻孔或头部尺寸太小的螺栓不能使用.

sentences.en: Conrad Anker, Brady Robinson and Jimmy Chin were confined to their undersize two - person portal edge several thousand feet up on the face.
sentences.cn: 康拉德•安科尔，布雷迪•罗宾逊和麦展只限于他们的尺寸不足二人入口边缘的数千英尺起来就面对。

sentences.en: Do not undersize supply and discharge piping.
sentences.cn: 供应管道和排泄管道的口径不要太小.

sentences.en: Do not undersize supply or oversize the valve in relation to demand.
sentences.cn: 根据需要确定供水管道和阀门通径.供水管道通径不要太小,阀门通径不要太大.

sentences.en: PHYSICAL FEATURES : SILVER GREY SPONGE METAL, DELIVERED SIZE OF 3 - 25 MM, LESS THAN 5 % UNDERSIZE OF 3 MM.
sentences.cn: 物理状态: 银灰色海绵状金属.交货粒度要求3—25毫米, 小于3毫米的物料不超过5%.
尺寸小于标准的凸轮轴主轴承轴颈.

trans.tran_cn: 较一般为小的，不够大的
